info.header: RSSAEGW004 - GGSN-initiated Update PDP Context cause code
info.csv_title: GGSN-initiated Update PDP Context cause code
info.help_text:
This report gives information about GTP-C v1 update PDP context response messages received per cause code on Gn/Gp (SGSN -> GGSN) interface.
Use case specific instructions:
- This report can be used to troubleshoot the 'GGSN (or PCRF) initiated Update PDP Context' procedures;
- Note, 'Ratio' column is applicable on UPRR level only.
info.report-description: GGSN-initiated Update PDP Context cause code
info.report-title: GGSN-initiated Update PDP Context cause code
